name: rt-jsonsync-lib
author: Takeshi Kubo <takeshi@quvox.net>
description: API for realtime JSON object synchronization

scripts.proto: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o src/proto/messages.js src/proto/messages.proto && pbjs -t static-module src/proto/messages.proto | pbts -o src/proto/messages.d.ts -
scripts.karma: yarn webpack && cross-env STAGE=dev TEST_ENV=source ./node_modules/.bin/karma start
scripts.karma:bundle: cross-env STAGE=dev yarn webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle karma start
scripts.karma:window: cross-env STAGE=dev yarn webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=window karma start
scripts.html: yarn webpack && yarn html:source && yarn html:bundle && yarn html:window
scripts.webpack:prod: cross-env STAGE=prod NODE_ENV=production webpack --optimize-minimize --mode production --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && cross-env STAGE=prod NODE_ENV=production yarn tsc && yarn webpack:prod
scripts.analyze: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --optimize-minimize --json --config webpack.prod.js | webpack-bundle-size-analyzer
